questions.question: This arc takes place on an island inhabited by giants and involves a struggle against a corrupt government official. What is...?
This arc takes the Straw Hat Pirates to a sky island where they face off against a self-proclaimed God with lightning powers. What is...?
Set in the East Blue, this arc features Luffy's first encounter with a Marine Captain known for his iron mace. What is...?
This power allows its user to manipulate darkness and gravity, famously held by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows for the manipulation of wire. What is...?
This ability, used by a notorious pirate, grants the power to produce and control mochi. What is...?
This character, known for their nickname 'Dead Bones', is a former Warlord of the Sea and master of swordsmanship. Who is...?
This character, a former member of the Donquixote Pirates, is known for his string-string fruit powers and role as a former Warlord of the Sea. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'God', was the former ruler of Skypiea and wielder of a powerful staff called the 'Goro Goro no Mi'. Who is...?
